net.fognode.mapping.api

Interface MappingRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistentMappingRepository

    public interface MappingRepository
    Holds the resource-to-resource mapping from the user-defined API (e.g. "/temperatures/1") to the resources (e.g. "temp1") on the physical endpoints (e.g. "http://localhost:5000"). A mapping entry with the exemplary values from above would be "/temperatures/1":"http://localhost:5000/temp1"
    Author:
    Ludwig Muench

      • getResourceLocation

        java.lang.String getResourceLocation(java.lang.String location)
        Parameters:
        location - the resource (path) of the user-defined API (e.g. "/temperatures/1")
        Returns:
        the url of the actual resource (e.g. "http://localhost:5000/temp1")
